programme_name: Program for Energy Upgrade of the Building Stock and Spatial Reorganization
description: The program aims to support the energy upgrade of buildings in the residential and commercial sectors, as well as spatial reorganization projects.
programme_objective: To reduce energy consumption and greenhouse gas emissions from buildings, improve the living conditions of citizens, and stimulate economic growth.
eligibility_criteria: Ownership or lease of a building for at least 5 years
property_requirements: Buildings must be located in areas designated for intervention
Buildings must have an Energy Performance Certificate (EPC)
funding_coverage: Up to 50% of the total eligible costs
application_end_date: 31/12/2025 or until all available funds are exhausted

energy_performance_targets.name: Primary Energy Ratio (PER)
energy_performance_targets.target: 40% reduction compared to the minimum energy performance requirements

energy_performance_targets.name: Final Energy Consumption (FEC)
energy_performance_targets.target: 35% reduction compared to the minimum energy performance requirements

application_process: Applications are submitted through the designated online platform.
additional_details: For more information, visit the official website of the program.
